abstract: The Dow industrials closed at the highest point since 2008, and the Nasdaq composite regained a level last seen in 2000.
snippet: The Dow industrials closed at the highest point since 2008, and the Nasdaq composite regained a level last seen in 2000.
lead_paragraph: It was just what the stock market needed. When one of the most closely watched data reports showed a generally strong picture of the United States economy on Friday, stocks on Wall Street picked right up and surged throughout the day, sending the Dow to its best closing level since 2008.

headline.main: 3-Year High for the Dow as Wall St. Cheers Data
headline.print_headline: 3-Year High For the Dow As Wall St. Cheers Data
